adventure_overview: A fun Adventure where Tigers learn how to perform a magic trick and create a secret code. For more magic tricks, check out the Cub Scout Magic Book available at www.scoutshop.org Prior to any activity, use Scouting America SAFE Checklist to ensure the safety of all those involved.

content.value: Learn a magic trick. Practice the trick. Share the trick with you den or family members.

requirements.text: Learn a magic trick. Practice the trick. Share the trick with you den or family members.

activities.name: Coin Through a Neckerchief
activities.description: Pass a coin magically though your Tiger neckerchief.

activities.name: Cub Scout Magic Book
activities.description: Use the Cub Scout Magic book to identify a trick for Cub Scouts to learn and perform.

content.value: Demonstrate how a magic trick works to your den, family or Tiger adult partner.

requirements.text: Demonstrate how a magic trick works to your den, family or Tiger adult partner.

activities.name: Magic Show
activities.description: Using the magic trick learned in requirement 1, conduct a magic show.

content.value: Write your name in secret code.

requirements.text: Write your name in secret code.

activities.name: Computer Name
activities.description: Use binary to spell your name.

activities.name: My Secret Code Part 1
activities.description: Cub Scouts will create their own unique secret code.

activities.name: Pig Pen Code
activities.description: Using the Pig Pen Code write your name.

content.value: Write a message with the code. Challenge your den, family or Tiger adult partner to read your coded message.

requirements.text: Write a message with the code. Challenge your den, family or Tiger adult partner to read your coded message.

activities.name: My Secret Code Part 2
activities.description: Using the secret code created in the activity My Secret Code Part 1 write a message and have Tiger adult partners decode the message.
